data.name: Matrix Life Science Inc.
data.description:
Leading Global Manufacturer and Supplier of Natural Ingredients like Tocopherols (Vitamin E), Rosemary Extracts & Phytosterols from a 100% Non- GMO sources. We are the first Indian Company to manufacture Non-GMO natural mixed tocopherols, d-Alpha tocopherol and Phytosterols in high concentrations. With the largest installation capacities spanning over 80000 sq. meters. we are one of the few companies to provide the range of natural vitamin E along with its derivatives, Rosemary extracts, and phytosterols under one roof.


VISION

Our vision is to create excellent quality products that combine green chemistry with technological advancement and grow responsibly while striving to improve the quality of life in our society.


MISSION

Our ambition drives us towards building a world-class company that challenges boundaries in the nutraceutical sphere while also making healthier alternatives available for everyone. Our focus is on delivering unsurpassed quality in all standards, using state-of-the-art production technologies and maintaining a competent workforce. Through our industrial partnerships, we aim to create value and complete customer satisfaction. Through our scientific ventures, we aim to set sail towards new horizons for mankind.

data.name: Naturall-e™ CosmoActive
data.description: Naturall-e™ CosmoActive is an active cosmetic blend with 3 active ingredients- Tocopherol, Phytosterol & Squalene. All these three active ingredients contribute their different individual attributes making CosmoActive a multi-beneficial product. This multi-beneficial ingredient exhibits anti-oxidants, skin moisturizing/conditioning properties, and increases skin metabolism.

data.name: PhytoLite
data.description: PhytoLite is our proprietary brand for phytosterols which are plant-derived compounds that are similar in structure and function to cholesterol. These ingredients find use in food, human nutrition, pharmaceuticals & skincare industries.

data.name: Naturall-e
data.description: Naturall-e or Natural vitamin E is an active ingredient which is commonly used to enrich food products and nutritional supplements. Naturall-e Natural Vitamin E (d-alpha tocopherol) shows twice the biological activity when compared to synthetic Vitamin E (d-Alpha Tocopherol). Natural Tocopherol is retained for longer duration in the body. Thus, Naturall-e is the best alternative to synthetic Vitamin E to enrich food and nutraceuticals.

data.name: BaCogMin
data.description: Bacopa extract is natural ingredient extracted from leaves of Bacopa monnieri. It is standardized to contain minimum 10-50% Bacosides by HPLC. Bacosides are reported to improve the memory and cognitive performance in elderly and children. Bacopa helps in reducing anxiety and for improving anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidant activities.

data.name: Naturall-Re
data.description:
Rosemary (Rosmarinus officinalis) is a fragrant herb with evergreen, needle-like leaves, and white, pink, purple, or blue flowers. Rosemary has been used in culinary applications since ancient times and reports on its antioxidant activity date back to the 1950s. Rosemary can be grown in a wide range of environmental conditions. Rosemary leaves contain two acids named Ursolic acid and Carnosic acid. Both the acids exhibit anti-bacterial, anti-cancer, anti-oxidative, and anti-inflammatory properties These acids are used as food preservatives and also for fighting lethal diseases.

Globally, Rosemary is grown between 9°C to 28°C with the pH of soil maintained at 4.5 to 8.7 with a rainfall of 0.3 to 2.7 meters. Growing Rosemary in India is quite a challenge due to its need for accurate climatic conditions and with our dedication and determination, we successfully managed to overcome the challenge of cultivating Rosemary in the unpredictable climatic conditions of the Aurangabad region and brought Rosemary from farm to table with advanced and state-of-art agro technologies. We feel proud every time we deliver the best quality Rosemary products to the world.

data.name: Tocofeed-e
data.description:
Vitamin E is a necessary and vital nutrient, performing a variety of important functions in the organism that has a significant influence on Metabolism and Immunity. Not only in the human body, but Vitamin E also plays an essential part in animals' bodies. Feeding an optimal amount of Vitamin E to farm animals can be tremendously beneficial for their health and productivity.

Tocofeed is a range of natural nutritional Vitamin E for the animal feed industry. Tocofeed contains natural mixed tocopherols and d-Alpha tocopherols which are bioactive and free forms of natural vitamin E showing excellent antioxidant effect along with improving immunity power in animals.

Tocofeed was launched in order to take charge of the provision of essential nutrients to species other than humans. Tocofeed brings the products which ensure the livestock and pets aren’t deficient in nutrients that facilitate smooth functioning. The more functional the animals are, the better their productivity.

data.name: Naturall-e™ d-Alpha Tocopherol 750IU Oil
data.description: Naturall-e™ d-Alpha Tocopherol 750IU Oil is an active ingredient and is the primary form of vitamin E that is preferentially used by the human body to meet appropriate dietary requirements. It is one of the crucial ingredients used in food products and nutritional supplements. d-Alpha-Tocopherol fulfills major dietary requirements and is an abundant and natural source of Vitamin E. The normal body retains natural d-alpha-tocopherol for a longer duration. Thus, natural-e d-Alpha-Tocopherol is the best alternative to synthetic vitamin E. Besides dietary requirements, it has decent antioxidant potency and inhibits angiogenesis.

data.description: Naturall-e™ d-Alpha Tocopheryl Polyethylene Glycol 1000 Succinate Non-GMO Soy (IP) is off-white to light yellow color waxy solid with little or no odor & taste. It is derived from 100% Non-GMO soy oilseed source. It is highly stable & water soluble derivative of Natural Vitamin E. It increases bioavailability of poorly absorbed drugs & nutrients acting as an absorption and permeability enhancer. As a water soluble compound, Naturall-e™ d-Alpha Tocopheryl Polyethylene Glycol 1000 Succinate Non-GMO Soy (IP) is primarily used as an efficient source of Natural Vitamin E, both for therapeutic purposes and nutrition. Applications includes in food and beverages industry where water soluble characteristic of Vitamin E is required & suitable for use in organic foods.

data.description: Naturall-Re™ Rosemary Extract Powder 10% (CA) is obtained by the solvent extraction of Rosemary leaf, Rosmarinus officinalis L. (Fam. Labiatae). It is free from Rosemary aroma and completely soluble in oil. Rosemary extract carnosic acid is considered to be a natural, efficient and stable (high temperature durable), security, non-toxic and non-side-effects, oil- soluble antioxidants and a green food additive.

data.name: Naturall-Le™ Soy Lecithin Liquid
data.description: Naturall-Le™ Soy Lecithin Liquid is generally used as an emulsifier. It is 100% pure lecithin, non-modified, and non-fractioned. Lecithin Liquid is a surface-active agent with unique properties, derived from vegetable oilseed sources. It can modify the boundary layers between many types of substances. In the presence of two immiscible liquid phases, lecithin reduces the surface tension and acts as an emulsifier. Along with emulsification, it also adds value to the nutrition of the product being rich in phospholipids.

content_blocks.html:
• Natural Vitamin E is extracted from 100% Natural sources like Soya, Sunflower & Rapeseed, whereas Synthetic Vitamin E is chemically prepared from petrochemicals namely Isophytol & Tri Methyl Hydroquinone.
  • d-Alpha Tocopherol molecule has one single molecular structure (R-R-R), whereas dl-Alpha Tocopherol molecule is made up of eight different structures (Stereoisomers). Out of these eight stereoisomers only one resembles natural Vitamin E form.
  • Our body has Tocopherol transfer protein (TTP) which recognizes natural Tocopherol only.

• Food Antioxidant : It is considered as one of the best natural antioxidant which effectively delays oxidation process and helps to increase shelf life of various food products. It is natural replacement to synthetic antioxidants like TBHO, BHA & BHT which are notorious for their side effects.
  • Food fortification : Natural Vitamin E is the best form for food fortification as it shows 100% biological activity. Vitamin E is the most important antioxidant defense of the body and hence various food products are fortified with it to provide wholesome nutrition.
  • Dietary suppliments : It is difficult to get Recommended Dietary Allowance (RDA) of Vitamin E from food sources alone. Hence dietary and Nutraceutical supplements ensures that our body gets its vital antioxidant supplement on regular basis to maintain optimum health.
  • Healthy skin & hair : Vitamin E is essential ingredient in maintaining healthy skin and hair. Mixed Tocopherol is the best form of Vitamin E for topical care applications. It effectively prevents skin & hair from free radical damage caused by harmful UV rays, pollution, etc.

data.description: Naturall-e™ d-Alpha Tocopheryl Polyethylene Glycol 1000 Succinate Non-GMO Sunflower is off-white to light yellow color waxy solid with little or no odor & taste. It is derived from 100% Non-GMO sunflower oilseed source. It is highly stable & water soluble derivative of Natural Vitamin E. It increases bioavailability of poorly absorbed drugs & nutrients acting as an absorption and permeability enhancer. As a water soluble compound, Naturall-e™ d-Alpha Tocopheryl Polyethylene Glycol 1000 Succinate Non-GMO Sunflower is primarily used as an efficient source of Natural Vitamin E, both for therapeutic purposes and nutrition. Applications includes in food and beverages industry where water soluble characteristic of Vitamin E is required & suitable for use in organic foods.
data.name: Naturall-e™ d-Alpha Tocopheryl Polyethylene Glycol 1000 Succinate Non-GMO Sunflower

data.description: Naturall-e™ d-Alpha Tocopheryl Succinate 1210IU Non-GMO Soy (IP) is off-white to white color powder with little or no odor & taste. It is derived from 100% Non-GMO soy oilseed source. It is esterified form of d - alpha - tocopherol in which the succinate group protects the hydroxyl group of the chromanol ring from oxidation. Hence it is a more stable form than d-alphatocopherol, the free or non-esterified form. It is intended to be used as Natural Vitamin E supplement in food & nutraceutical industry. It is suitable for use in Organic food and nutritional supplements.

data.name: Matrix Life Science Inc.
data.description:
Leading Global Manufacturer and Supplier of Natural Ingredients like Tocopherols (Vitamin E), Rosemary Extracts & Phytosterols from a 100% Non- GMO sources. We are the first Indian Company to manufacture Non-GMO natural mixed tocopherols, d-Alpha tocopherol and Phytosterols in high concentrations. With the largest installation capacities spanning over 80000 sq. meters. we are one of the few companies to provide the range of natural vitamin E along with its derivatives, Rosemary extracts, and phytosterols under one roof.


VISION

Our vision is to create excellent quality products that combine green chemistry with technological advancement and grow responsibly while striving to improve the quality of life in our society.


MISSION

Our ambition drives us towards building a world-class company that challenges boundaries in the nutraceutical sphere while also making healthier alternatives available for everyone. Our focus is on delivering unsurpassed quality in all standards, using state-of-the-art production technologies and maintaining a competent workforce. Through our industrial partnerships, we aim to create value and complete customer satisfaction. Through our scientific ventures, we aim to set sail towards new horizons for mankind.
